name: МЫЛО УРОНИЛ
description:
ATTENTION!

All characters are fictional any coincidence is an accident!

The game is a simulator of prison tasks that will probably help you in the future, or maybe not.

Your character got into the prison cell with experienced prisoners and how you show yourself in the first will greatly affect your future and your environment, so choose your answer wisely and consider the consequences of your choice.

Credits:
Music: Hard Bass School & DJ Blyatman - Blast
Effects and more: zapsplat
Idea: AFGANBIK
